song.title: Infinite Dreams
song.info:
INFINITE DREAMS - 6:09
Written by IRON MAIDEN (Harris) Covered by Malekith in November '98
Tracked exclusively for BEST OF THE FANS II musicdisk, organized by Dragon and Hakan Jerning
I REMOVED THIS F---ING GUITAR LOOPING ! :-))
Some samples were taken from mods by Cadaver, Betrayer and MCD. Greets to them and : Dragon and Hakan, of course Friz Galahad and all the RED members and ALL the metal trackers
By the way : I don't know who made the Snaredrum and Bassdrum samples I used, just cause I found them in several mods by different trackers, without any word about them. The only thing is that these samples are FUCKING GOOD !
I also tracked "Revelations" for this musicdisk. If you like this one, MAKE SURE to download the others !
email : malekith@listen.to URL : http://listen.to/malekith ICQ : 49731906
This was not as hard as I expected, mainly because this song has an easy solo (not like those from Piece Of Mind). It took me about 6 hours (except for recording and looking for samples)
UP THE IRONS !!!!!
Malekith
